example.parse: (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ اذ) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يُرجع) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الكاتب)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC اصول) (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الازمة)))) (PUNC -) (CONJ او) (NP (PP (PREP على) (NP (DET+ADJ_COMP+CASE_DEF_GEN الأقل))) (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC تفاقم) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها)))) (PUNC -) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اندلاع) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN النزاع)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بين) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN السنّة) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الشيعة))))) (PP-TMP (PUNC -LRB-) (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN القرن) (DET+ADJ_NUM+CASE_DEF_GEN الثامن)) (PUNC -RRB-)))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: the origin of this crisis or at least its exacerbation,

example.arg: أصول هذه الأزمة أو على الأقل تفاقمها

arg.g: to the outbreak of the conflict between Sunnis and Shiites in the eighth century

example.arg: إلى اندلاع النزاع بين السنة و الشيعة في القرن الثامن

frameset.edef: to return something, to bring something back

verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on OarojaE-v
